hangle: 이제 네가 가고 싶은 곳이 있다면 떠나도 좋다,
first_translate: if there’s somewhere you’d like to go now that your training is over,
fiona,
I won’t stop you from leaving.

hangle: 원하는 게 있다면 자유롭게 할 수 있어.
first_translate: now that you’re officially an adult, I want you to do whatever makes you happy.

hangle: 네 마법 실력이라면 수도에서 부귀영화를 누릴 수도 있을 테고.
first_translate: with your skills, you could live a life of luxury in the capital if you wanted to.

hangle: …사생아인 게 신경쓰이면 헤일론의 이름으로 후견인을 해 주마.
first_translate: and if being illegitimate bothers you so much, then I’ll become your guardian under house haylon.

hangle: 그러면 수도에서도 널 함부로 대하지는 못할 거다.
first_translate: that way no one will dare treat you poorly even when you are at the capital.
wow... this was unexpected.
what is?

hangle: 공작님이 이런 친절한 제안을 해 주시다니…
first_translate: the fact that his grace would make such a kind offer--

hangle: 나는 그저 네게 마땅한 대가를 지불할 뿐이다만.
first_translate: it's only fair for me to pay back what I owe you.
but didn’t my salary cover all of that already?
do you think money can buy everything?

hangle: 그건 단순히 네 노동에 대한 값에 불과해.
first_translate: your salary was just payment for your labor.
this has nothing to do with that.

hangle: 아벨이 이런 상냥한 생각을 하고 있었다니…
first_translate: to think he had something as sweet as this planned out...

hangle: 그동안 피도 눈물도 없다고 욕해서 미안!
first_translate: sorry about calling him heartless all these years!
oh, right...
take this.
a letter came for you from home.
my “home”...
count green’s manor!
dear father, our youngest child wants to join the war effort.

hangle: 수줍어서 크게 말은 못 하는 것 같지만.
first_translate: she seems too shy to say anything herself though.

hangle: 어린 나를 억지로 전쟁터로 등 떠민 장본인들.
first_translate: from those people who forced their young daughter into battle...
then why did they send me this letter after five whole years without any news?

hangle: 5년간 편지 한 통 보낸 적이 없더니…
first_translate: then why did they send me this letter after five whole years without any news?
then why did they send me this letter after five whole years without any news?
then why did they send me this letter after five whole years without any news?

hangle: 글쎄, 나도 뜯어 보지는 않아서 모르지.
first_translate: no idea. haven’t opened it yet either.
right. well, if you wish,

hangle: 널 이곳으로 떠민 본가를 부수는 일도 해 주마.
first_translate: I'll help destroy the family that sent you here against your will.

hangle: 그동안 캐 놓은 약점이 꽤 많거든.
first_translate: I’ve dug up quite a few weaknesses on them while you were away.
is this how abel shows appreciation...?

hangle: 그, 그 정도로 복수심에 불타지는 않아요.
first_translate: n-no need to take things that far.
honestly, I don’t really care anymore anyway.
well, that does sound more like you.

hangle: 나라면 힘이 생긴 즉시 먼지 한 톨 남기지 않고 없애버렸겠지만.
first_translate: me? I'd have wiped them off the face of earth the moment I got strong enough.
in any case...

hangle: 확실히 이제 곧 원작이 시작될 시점이구나.
first_translate: the original story must start soon.
the heroine should appear around this time too.

hangle: 내가 시그렌 곁에 있어 봤자 정신만 사나울지도…
first_translate: staying by sigren might cause some trouble...
either way, thank you very much for offering.
if you mean it, call me "father."
I’m good.
cold-hearted brat.
haha...
you seem rather upset today.
let’s see...
uh... basically...
they want confirmation of my death?!
that’s pretty much it.

hangle: 현재, 내 아버지인 그린 백작이 위독하다.
first_translate: apparently, my biological father, count green, is dying.

hangle: 때문에 유산과 관련된 일을 처리해야 하니,
first_translate: for matters concerning inheritance,

hangle: 그린 가문의 혈육인 피오나의 사망을 확인하는 문서를 보내 달라-
first_translate: they want proof that fiona, blood relative of house green, died long ago.

hangle: 애초에 살아있다는 생각은 하지도 않은 모양이군.
first_translate: guess they never thought I survived.

hangle: 이미 5년 전에 죽으라고 사지로 내보낸 집안의 천덕꾸러기였다.
first_translate: after sending me off to die five years ago, I'm probably dead to them.

hangle: 줄곧 잊고 있다 유산 문제를 처리할 때가 되어서야 생각이 났겠지.
first_translate: they've forgotten about me until now because they needed to settle the matter of succession.
how typical of them.

hangle: 그린 가문의 유산에는 눈곱만큼도 관심 없어.
first_translate: I couldn’t care less about inheriting anything from house green.

hangle: 아버지인 그린 백작의 임종을 지킬 의리도 없고.
first_translate: I also feel no obligation to stay by my father during his final moments.
but still...

hangle: 하필 아벨이 하고 싶은걸 하며 살라고 할 때쯤 일이 터지다니.
first_translate: of all times, this happens when abel tells me to pursue my dreams.

hangle: 나중에 내가 살아 있다는 걸 알고 나면 성가지게 굴겠지.
first_translate: when they find out later that I’m alive, they’ll freak out.

hangle: 일단 그린 가의 호적에 올라가 있으니
first_translate: as long as I remain registered as part of house green,
until they confirm my death,

hangle: 내가 살아 있다는 걸 알게 될 거고.
first_translate: they’ll know I’m actually alive.

hangle: 그냥 상속 포기 각서에 먼저 사인을 할까?
first_translate: maybe I should sign papers renouncing my claim first.

hangle: 아벨이 복수해도 된다고 했지만 구태여 그러고 싶진 않다.
first_translate: abel said I could get revenge, but I don’t wanna bother myself with that.

hangle: 5년 전의 일로 감정을 쏟고 싶지 않아.
first_translate: I don’t want to waste emotions on events from five years ago.

hangle: 엄연한 귀족인 그들을 직접적으로 죽이거나 큰 상해를 줘도 안돼.
first_translate: killing or harming nobles directly isn’t allowed.
not unless I want to end up behind bars.
the easiest solution...

hangle: 포기 각서에 사인하고 남남이 되는 것.
first_translate: ...is signing documents giving up my rights and cutting ties completely.
first, I gotta head back home...

hangle: 수도...를 한 번쯤 마음 편히 돌아보고 싶긴 했지.
first_translate: I always wanted to visit the capital once before leaving forever.
fiona, are you there?
siegren. come in.
no thanks.
I’ll talk to you outside.
really?

hangle: 몇 년 전만 해도 침대 위에서 같이 이야기를 할 만큼 친했는데…
first_translate: we used to chat lying down together not so long ago...

hangle: 요즘에는 컸다고 이런 식으로 서먹하게 군다니까.
first_translate: but nowadays, we keep distance since we grew older.
I heard from duke haylon...
call him master.

hangle: 스...승님이 네가 곧 여기를 떠날지도 모른다던데.
first_translate: m-master told me you may leave soon.
probably.
where are you going?

hangle: 우선은 아버지가 위독하다는 편지가 와서 수도로 가 보려고.
first_translate: I received a letter saying my father is ill, so I plan to return to the capital.

hangle: 그린 가는 중앙 귀족이라 수도에 저택이 있으니까.
first_translate: house green owns a mansion there since they belong to central aristocracy.
so you still consider him your father despite abandoning you.

hangle: 굳이 말하자면 부를 호칭이 마땅치 않아선데.
first_translate: I wouldn’t exactly use that term.
are you planning to attend his funeral and come back afterward?
no, I want to look around the city while I’m there.
shouldn’t be bad considering you spent most of your days cooped up inside haylon castle.
then... when will you return?
um...

hangle: 아, 시그렌이 뭘 오해하고 있는지 알겠다.
first_translate: wait, I realize what siegern thinks now.

hangle: 시그렌, 난 지금으로선 딱히 돌아올 생각이 없어.
first_translate: at present, I have no plans to ever come back, siegren.
what do you mean?
I’m not coming back.
why not?
because I have no reason left to stay here.
exactly.
during the past five years, siegren became a close friend,
and sometimes I protected him.

hangle: 원작이 시작되는 시점을 코앞에 둔 지금은,
first_translate: but now that the actual story begins,

hangle: 내가 그를 위해 할 수 있는 일이 거의 없는 셈이다.
first_translate: there’s almost nothing else I can do for him.
can we talk for a bit?
o-of course.
you’re gonna leave us?
yeah.
“yeah”?!

hangle: 어떻게 그걸 한마디 말도 없이 순식간에 결정해?
first_translate: how could you decide that overnight without telling anyone?

hangle: 공작님이 이제 성인이니 하고 싶은 거 하라고 해서?
first_translate: did duke haylon tell you to follow your dreams now that you’re an adult?
abel...
th-that bastard...!!!
use nice words.
is that all you have to say?

hangle: 우리가 5년 동안 생사고락을 함께한 사이란 건 잊었어?
first_translate: did you forget we went through thick and thin together for five years?
I’m hurt.
I’ll write letters.
that’s not the problem!
then what is?
all of it.
siegren.

hangle: 설마 우리가 영원히 함께할 거라 생각했던 건 아니지?
first_translate: don’t tell me you expected us to stick together forever!
